name: tm02
effect: Teaches Dragon Claw to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dragon Claw to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Headbutt Gen I: Razor Wind)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.
